title: AYURVEDA SCIENCE with Dr. Scott Keller
author: Nya Fleron
description: Dr. Scott Keller, a board-certified N.Y.S. licensed chiropractor, has been in practice for 19 years. He has developed an innovative approach to healing, guided by interests that took root early in his childhood. Using eastern and western medical methods, and advice on diet, exercise and supplements, Dr. Keller has transformed the lives of countless patients.
